content.rendered:
Directed by Christopher Storer. Joanna Calo.

Written by Karen Joseph Adcock. Karen Joseph Adcock. Sofya Levitsky-Weitz. Sofya Levitsky-Weitz. Alexander O’Keefe. Christopher Storer. Christopher Storer. Joanna Calo. Rene Gube. Catherine Schetina.

Cast Ebon Moss-Bachrach(Richard ‘Richie’ Jerimovich) . Ayo Edebiri(Sydney Adamu) . Lionel Boyce(Marcus) . Liza ColÃ³n-Zayas(Tina) . Edwin Lee Gibson(Ebraheim) . Corey Hendrix(Gary ‘Sweeps’ Woods) . Richard Esteras(Manny) . Jose M. Cervantes(Angel) . Abby Elliott(Natalie ‘Sugar’ Berzatto) . Matty Matheson(Neil Fak) . Chris Witaske(Pete) . Joel McHale(NYC Chef) . Carmen Christopher(Chester) . Christopher Zucchero(Chi-Chi) . Oliver Platt(Uncle Jimmy) . Jon Bernthal(Michael Berzatto) . Millie Hurley(Tracy) . P.J. Fishwick(Delivery Guy / …) . Molly Ringwald(Moderator) . Amy Morton(Nancy Chore) . Pedro Henrique(Louie) . Abby Pierce(Erica) . Vasily Deris(Crooked John) . Patrick Dunham(Evil Carrot) . Dave Maher(Man) . Richard Cotovsky(Mr. Carl) . Greg Poljacik(Phil Ramis) . Doug Vickers(Sysco) . Jack Callahan(Very Old Man) . Mick Napier(Cousin Frank) . Chris McClure(Robot) . Sarah Wisterman(Commis) . Jennefer Folsom(Debbie) . Aaron Crippen(Nerd 1) . Kai Young(Nerd 2) . Shadee Vossoughi(Female Employee) . Gram Otero Livemore(Joey) . Sebastian Merlo(Nicky) . Brian Boland(Guard #1) . David Folsom(Phil) . Will Bennett(Nerd 3) . Anne Thompson(Cashier) . Nicholas Zakula(Guard #2) . Sue Salvi(Adult #1) . Paul Grondy(Adult #2) . Kevin Regal(Guard #3) . Christopher Kahler(Hardware Shopper (uncredited)) . Patrick Allen Bolen(Al-Anon Attendee (uncredited))

Languages English. Spanish.

Producers Tyson Bidner. Joanna Calo. Rene Gube. Carrie Holt de Lama. Matty Matheson. Nate Matteson. Hiro Murai. Josh Senior. Christopher Storer. Courtney Storer. Cooper Wehde.

Production FX Productions. Super Frog.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 18

Status OnGoing(2022– )
